thread.section_title: Buying Business Travel | For Business, Corporate Travel & Meeting Buyers & Arrangers
thread.title: VLM Airlines expands fare distribution

title: VLM Airlines expands fare distribution
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Fri, 11 Sep 2015 10:14 Follow @thomasnewcombe VLM Airlines has expanded the distribution of its schedules and fares by joining IATA’s Billing and Settlement Plan ( BSP ).
The agreement means VLM Airlines’ flights will be displayed on all major GDSs, with content going live on Amadeus today (September 11), and on Galileo and Worldspan in late-October.
Through BSP distribution will be across 10 countries - Belgium, Netherlands, UK, Ireland, Germany, Switzerland, France, Italy, Spain and Greece.
VLM recently announced it would launch a service from its base in Antwerp to Birmingham in October.
